ingredients.ingredient: 1 (1 ounce) package ranch salad dressing mix
½ cup shredded reduced-fat Cheddar cheese

cookingTips: Neufchatel cheese is lower in fat than cream cheese but provides creamy texture
Mix dressing powder with softened cheese before adding milk to prevent lumps
Bake at 375°F for 15-20 minutes until cheese is bubbling at edges
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Show the cook how to streamline twice-baked potatoes using convenient ranch seasoning mix and reduced-fat ingredients for lighter fare.
